0100100010011010 1101011111011000 0 -> sum: 0010000001110010, cout: 1
1001110001010011 0000011000001001 0 -> sum: 1010001001011100, cout: 0

0000000000000000 1111111111111111 0 -> sum: 1111111111111111, cout: 0
